code: import React from"react";import"./Services.css";import theme_pattern from"../../assets/theme_pattern.svg";import Services_Data from"../../assets/services_data";import arrow_icon from"../../assets/arrow_icon.svg";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Services=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"services",className:"services",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"services-title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"My Services"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:theme_pattern,alt:""})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"services-container",children:Services_Data.map((service,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"services-format",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:service.s_no}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:service.s_name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:service.s_desc}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"services-readmore",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Read More"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:arrow_icon,alt:""})]})]},index);})})]});};
